description: After being discharged, the girls believe that Miyuki is the fourth member of Pretty Cure. They go on another search for the Akarun. However, they run into Eas again, who reveals her identity as Setsuna.

titles.title: Setsuna and Love: You Are Eas!?
Setsuna to Love: Anata ga Eas na no!?
せつなとラブ あなたがイースなの!?
